name: chat-app
description: A React Native chat app designed around the Gifted Chat UI. Using Google Firestore, users experience a real-time chat interface with offline capabilites. See the readme on Github for more details.

name: movie_api
description: A full stack API that was built using React. Clients can create and edit thier profile, browse movies and their details, and add those movies to a list of favorites. Other tools used include JWT and Node.js (server side). Data is retrieved by querying a REST API that I created from scratch.

name: todo-app
description: This is a responsive todo list app built with Vue. Clients can add, edit, delete, and prioritize items to their todo list. This was achieved by implementing a Material Design UI that utilizes the Vue.Draggable package.

name: meetup-app
description: This is a PWA meetup app that was built using React. Clients can find upcoming events anywhere in the world, see the details of each event, and follow a link to rsvp. As a PWA, Murph's Meetups is able to be used offline, displaying a user's cached data. The Moment library was used with Recharts to provide data visualization for how many events occur per day for the next week, how many people are attending, and how many slots are left. Data for this app was retrieved via Axios requests to the Meetup API.
